title: Programming Assignment 1: Hello World
description: Write your first program in Python that prints 'Hello, World!' and demonstrates basic input/output operations.

title: Programming Assignment 2: Variables and Data Types
description: Create a program that demonstrates the use of different data types and variable operations.

title: Midterm Project: Simple Calculator
description: Build a console-based calculator that can perform basic arithmetic operations.

title: Algorithm Analysis Assignment
description: Analyze the time and space complexity of various sorting algorithms.

title: Data Structures Implementation
description: Implement a linked list, stack, and queue with full functionality.

title: Calculus Problem Set 1
description: Solve derivative problems involving polynomial, exponential, and trigonometric functions.

title: Calculus Problem Set 2
description: Applications of derivatives including optimization and related rates problems.

title: Psychology Research Paper
description: Write a 5-page research paper on a chosen topic in cognitive psychology with APA formatting.

title: Psychology Case Study Analysis
description: Analyze a provided case study using psychological principles and theories.
